title: Black Right-Pointing Triangle

nouns: A mark to indicate a direction or relation
A mark to indicate a direction or relation.
A sign or symbol used to indicate a direction (e.g. \to).

description:
A triangle-shaped arrow, pointing right. Commonly used as a symbol for play.

See the glossary for information on the term black in unicode character names.
apple_vendor_description: The play button emoji on Apple devices is a sleek, crimson triangle, rendered with Apple‚Äôs characteristic glossy 3D shading and a prominent highlight that suggests a polished, almost metallic surface. Its smooth, rounded corners and vibrant color are designed to be instantly recognizable and inviting, embodying the essence of starting something. On Apple devices, this emoji is the universal symbol for initiating playback, starting a video, or beginning an action.
